layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x150
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x150
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x126
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 192x19
          text run at (0,0) width 192: "COLGROUP WIDTH=relative"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 300x90 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 298x88
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 298x84
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 144x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 138x79
                text run at (2,2) width 130: "Table width is 300px."
                text run at (2,22) width 134: "This column should be"
                text run at (2,42) width 91: "1/2 as wide as "
                text run at (93,42) width 47: "Column"
                text run at (2,62) width 68: "2 or 100px"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (148,2) size 148x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 134x79
                text run at (2,2) width 130: "Table width is 300px."
                text run at (2,22) width 134: "This column should be"
                text run at (2,42) width 99: "twice as wide as"
                text run at (2,62) width 119: "Column 1 or 200px"
